name: SNPMATIC
short_description: SNPMATIC (SNP MicroArray Training, Inference and Classification) is a tool for SNP genotype analysis of Affymetrix SNP Microarrays.  It is in the early stages of development and it is expected that interest will be limited mainly to developers for now.
